about_the_game:
Party Quest is a 2D MMO platformer chalked full of mini games (Party Quests), secrets, and more! Each unique Party Quest that you find and unlock will challenge you and your fellow party members to accomplish various tasks in a set time limit. Each time you and your party compete each of you will receive epic rewards to help progress your characters forward. These rewards will help you level up you character, enhance your abilities, and progress your gear with each Party Quest win.


  • MMO

    Choose a server, play with friends, or meet new friends across Party Quest's open world. Each server can support hundreds of players in that region.

  • Party Quest

    Each unique mini game (Party Quest) that you find in the open world will challenge you and your fellow party members to accomplish various tasks in a set time limit. One Party Quest may challenge your party to climb a twisting tower in a set time frame, whereas the next one you find may challenge your party to play against another party, and earn points by defeat enemies in a set time frame.

  • Character Customization

    Defeating enemies in the open world or in Party Quests will reward you and your party members with many different rewards such as helmets, chestplates, leggings, and more! Equip items to empower and customize your character.

name: Party Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 (Security Update KB3033929) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2.4Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8600 GH / ATI Radeon HD 3450
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 3.0Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 / ATI Radeon HD 3870 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card
